name: Playground (popuko)
description:
What is Playground?

Playground is a sandbox game created in Unity. Currently it is small with not many features, but a lot of features will be added soon!

What can I do in Playground?

For now, just jump and run around.

What's coming to Playground?

Hopefully, a map selection, more models, and possibly multiplayer.

What's the controls?

Move with the usual WASD controls. Crouching currently does not exist.

Pressing Escape will quit the game. 

Alt+Enter toggles fullscreen.

Please enjoy it,and have fun!!
